name: Prana Ebelie Shorts - Women's
description:
Lightweight boardshorts that are ready to SUP, surf or paddle the summer away. The soft, yet strong Sorona® polyester, makes the Ebelie Shorts a hot-day standout.Light, moisture-wicking Sorona polyester.Drawcord waist.Hand pockets have mesh pocket bags for fast draining.Standard fit feels just right.

        Sustainability
